trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 가능한 제스처를 나타내는 선입니다.

trans-unit.source: The results from the gesture recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 제스처 인식기에서 결과입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether strokes should be considered a gesture.
trans-unit.target: 제스처 스트로크 고려해 야 하는지 여부를 나타내는 부울 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event occurs, the value of the Cancel property depends on the first <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> in the collection returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>이벤트 발생, Cancel 속성의 값에 따라 달라 집니다 첫 번째 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>에서 반환 된 컬렉션에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>, or if it is a gesture whose <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> is a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>, then Cancel is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>, 제스처 경우 또는 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A>아닌 다른 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>, Cancel은 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, Cancel is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 취소 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: When Cancel is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> adds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A> to its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 취소 다음과 같은 경우 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A>해당 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A> 추가</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: When Cancel is `true`, the strokes are not added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 취소 다음과 같은 경우 `true`, 스트로크 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> 에 추가 되지 않습니다

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the strokes are ink; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the strokes are a gesture.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>스트로크 잉크;는 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 스트로크 제스처는 경우.

trans-unit.source: Returns results from the gesture recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 제스처 인식기에서 결과 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection returned by the GetGestureRecognitionResults method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: GetGestureRecognitionResults 메서드에 의해 반환 된 컬렉션 정렬 기준으로 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, GetGestureRecognitionResults might return a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> objects with the following values: |Index|ApplicationGesture|RecognitionConfidence| |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |0|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |1|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |2|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |3|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 GetGestureRecognitionResults 다음 값을 갖는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>개체의 컬렉션을 반환할 수 있습니다. | 인덱스 | ApplicationGesture | RecognitionConfidence | |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |&0; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&1; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&2; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&3; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| 즉는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>가능성이 매우 임을 인식 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>비교적 가능성이 확인 표시 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>하지 제스처 및 일 가능성이 전혀 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>소용돌이 또는 이중 소용돌이.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The GetGestureRecognitionResults method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> with a higher degree of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than it has for other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > The GetGestureRecognitionResults 메서드 배열을 반환할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>와 더 높은 수준의 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>다른 응용 프로그램 제스처이 보다.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 가능성이 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>낮은 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> 있는 제스처와 달리를 제스처 하지</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A collection of possible application gestures that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes*> might be.
trans-unit.target: 가능한 응용 프로그램의 모음 제스처는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes*>될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides a way to invoke event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase efficiency over the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 기본 구현을 통해 효율성을 높일 수 있는 형식별 방법으로 이벤트 처리기를 호출 하는 방법을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The generic handler / delegate implementation to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 제네릭 처리기 / 대리자 구현을 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The target on which the provided handler should be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 된 처리기를 호출 해야 하는 대상입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 가능한 제스처를 나타내는 스트로크를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 가능한 제스처를 나타내는 선입니다.
